款.definition: section; paragraph; funds; CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]; classifier for versions or models (of a product)

款伏.definition: to obey; faithfully following instructions; to admit guilt

款冬.definition: coltsfoot (Tussilago farfara), plant in sunflower family Asteracae used a cough suppressant

款子.definition: a sum of money; CL:筆|笔[bi3]

款待.definition: to entertain; to be hospitable to

款服.definition: to obey; faithfully following instructions; to admit guilt

款步.definition: to walk slowly; with deliberate steps

款語移時.definition: to talk slowly and in depth (idiom)

款項.definition: funds; a sum of money; CL:宗[zong1]
